text: madayanana pani pase jyare pahoncya, to joyum ke lokonum eka jutha tyam pani pivadavi rahyum che ane be stri'o alaga ubhi rahi potana (dhorone) rokata dekha'i, puchyum ke tamane sum muskeli che? Te banne'e kahyum ke jyam sudhi a caravanara pacha na jaya tyam sudhi ame pani nahim pivadavi'e ane amara pita ghana vrdva che
